headline: Regeneron makes second bid for blood cancer therapy approval
summary: The FDA will issue a decision on odronextamab’s accelerated approval in relapsed/refractory follicular lymphoma by 30 July 2025.

raw.headline: Regeneron makes second bid for blood cancer therapy approval
